directives.text: Obligatory Tsudere had been my friend since childhood. We never had any romantic feelings toward each other, but now that she was starting to grow up, I realized she would be an excellent partner in my lifelong quest to slay the white whale which had claimed my leg and my dignity.
Main-character-san! Are we actually IN Moby Dick right now? That's animal cruelty! I would like to be excluded from this narrative!

options.text: Sorry, let's go back to the generic anime plot.
Grab a rope, sailor, there's a storm coming!
options.comment: Without a destination, we just continue the directives.

choice.text: The ship pitched and rolled as the storm swept in.
